Message.Title: ebay going to pick up Groupon in summer 2013
Message.Msg: You heard it hear 1st, they will bid about 8-10$ for GRPN by July 4th,2013. Might win, but others will be bidding also

Yes, on the Walmart site, but not within the store. And no deal teaming up with Paypal to make a debit card for non-card holders - this is the mother of all treasure hunts. Why not Paypal if it's so great? Credit cards and their companies are supposed to be dead, right? Not according to Walmart.

Your foolishness is funny I just used our Paypal Debit card at Walmart last night for a pair of $12 shoes no problem Are you sure you know anything about Paypal, you might try opening an account to enjoy the benefits they can offer online sellers and buyers alike. . .

Topic.Title: Supreme Court to rule....Sold all my shares this morning

Message.Msg: You're a nut! It only applys to items BOUGHT overseas and imported into the United States ~ LOL This would affect ZERO items in my household. . .

The ability to use your Paypal debit card has nothing to do with Paypal and everything to do with it being a MASTERCARD or VISA debit card. BTW, I've had Paypal since the beginning - even had Billpoint before Paypal absorbed them, which is probably longer than you've used Paypal.

Message.Title: How Old is Your Paypal Account?
Message.Msg: I did a history search and found my first transaction on Paypal to be on 12-17-2000 I never had a billpoint account. . .
